title: Easier Research Software Engineering
text: goal rsetools make research software engineering easier.

title: Easier Research Software Engineering
text: can install development version rsetools GitHub :

title: Easier Research Software Engineering
code: library(rsetools)  use_dictionary(mtcars) #> # A tibble: 11 × 4 #>    dataset name  typeof definition #>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 data    mpg   double <NA>       #>  2 data    cyl   double <NA>       #>  3 data    disp  double <NA>       #>  4 data    hp    double <NA>       #>  5 data    drat  double <NA>       #>  6 data    wt    double <NA>       #>  7 data    qsec  double <NA>       #>  8 data    vs    double <NA>       #>  9 data    am    double <NA>       #> 10 data    gear  double <NA>       #> 11 data    carb  double <NA>

title: Draft a data dictionary — use_dictionary
code: use_dictionary(mtcars) #> # A tibble: 11 × 4 #>    dataset name  typeof definition #>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 data    mpg   double NA         #>  2 data    cyl   double NA         #>  3 data    disp  double NA         #>  4 data    hp    double NA         #>  5 data    drat  double NA         #>  6 data    wt    double NA         #>  7 data    qsec  double NA         #>  8 data    vs    double NA         #>  9 data    am    double NA         #> 10 data    gear  double NA         #> 11 data    carb  double NA
